title: Freaking bans, or low priority queue for their faults
body: Riot. I understand I mess up. I understand sometimes I'm at fault for dodging. But when it's your fault. When your client decides to lag out. I should not be punished. Seriously. You have money. Make more stable clients. Please.

replies.body: As Deep Terror Nami mentioned, there are often a lot of local configurations that can resolve most technical issues with the client. If you can dive into some deeper details as to what issues you're specifically seeing, we can offer some targetted steps to resolve the issues.

Far more often than not the issue can be fixed from the user's end. If you could describe in detail what kind of issues you are experiencing, when, and what may be triggering them, we may be able to assist so that you can play the game without them. If you ever want to troubleshoot on your own the [Player Support knowledgebase](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) is a great place to start, and if you utilize Google you may find discussions where others have had the same issue and shared the steps they discovered to resolve it.
